content:
The provided code defines a `AnimPanel` class for controlling animations of multiple actors in a Tkinter GUI application. The chunk being situated appears to be part of the control panel setup, adding buttons and checkboxes for animation control.

self.toEndButton = self.createcomponent(
            'toEnd', (), None,
            tk.Button, (controlFrame,),
            text = '>>',
            width = 4,
            command = self.resetAllToEnd)
        self.toEndButton.pack(side = tk.LEFT, expand = 1, fill = tk.X)

        self.loopVar = tk.IntVar()
        self.loopVar.set(0)
        self.loopButton = self.createcomponent(
            'loopButton', (), None,
            tk.Checkbutton, (controlFrame,),
            text = 'Loop', width = 8,
            variable = self.loopVar)
        self.loopButton.pack(side = tk.LEFT, expand = 1, fill = tk.X)
